material.mattext: an internal communication system for businesses
a communication system for the U.S. navy
the same as the World Wide Web
The concept of the Internet was developed by the U.S. Department of Defense as a network that ________ in event of an attack.
The World Wide Web was based on a protocol developed by ________.
The "fathers of the Internet" are Vinton Cerf and ________.
Software that enables you to display and interact with text and other media on the web is a web ________.
The web is based on the ________ Protocol.
A computer connected to the Internet that asks for data is a(n) ________.
Which of the following is not a description of the unique identification number assigned to your computer when you connect to the Internet?
________ is a professional, business-oriented social networking site.
Which of the following is not considered a social networking/media site?
A ________ usually allows multiple users to add, remove, or edit its content.
Which of the following are personal video journal entries posted on the web?
A(n) ________ is usually a live broadcast of audio or video content.
A ________ is a personal journal posted on the web and is usually maintained by one person.
post journal entries on the web
communicate with friends in real time
edit video files over the web
Which of the following is not a tip for professional e-mail etiquette?
Be concise and to the point.
Use spell-checker and proofread before sending.
Use abbreviations such as "u," "r," and "BRB" to keep the e-mail message shorter.
________ is installed on your computer, and when the program is opened, your e-mail downloads to your computer.
Which of the following is not a type of e-commerce business?
Microsoft ________ is a cloud storage and file sharing service.
A subset of e-commerce that uses social networks to assist in marketing and purchasing products is known as ________ commerce.
Which of the following is not a precaution to take when shopping online?
Pay with a debit card, not a credit card.
Avoid making online transactions on a public computer.
When placing an order, make sure you receive a confirmation number.
Which of the following is not a feature of the most popular web browsers?
The browser feature which enables tabs to work independently from one another so if one crashes, the others may continue to work is known as ________.
The unique address for a particular website is the ________.
In the URL: http://www.microsoft.com/surface, the portion labeled ".com" is the ________.
In the URL: http://www.microsoft.com/surface, the portion labeled "surface" is the ________.
In the URL: http://www.microsoft.com/surface, the portion labeled "http" is the ________.
Which of the following top-level domains is restricted to degree-granting institutions?
A(n) ________ is a navigation aid that shows the path you have taken to get to a web page or where the page is located within the website.
AND, OR, and NOT are examples of ________ operators.
creating fake profiles on a dating site and developing a fabricated online and phone relationship
posting inflammatory remarks to solicit angry and negative responses
posting embarrassing pictures, rumors, or videos via social media
When you purchase a new computer from Apple.com for yourself to use at school, you are using which model of e-commerce?
When you sell your bicycle to another individual on eBay, you are engaging in which type of e-commerce?
Which of the following is not true about instant messaging?
It only requires an Internet connection.
It does not use cellular data.
Because of security concerns, businesses do not use it.
It can often be real-time communication.
Which of the following is not true about texting?
It is also called text messaging.
It uses SMS for text-based messages.
It uses MMS to send images or videos.
It uses the Internet, not your cellular network.
Which of the following is not true about VOIP?
It uses digital, not analog, signals.
It stands for Voice Over Internet Possibility
It uses the Internet, rather than regular phone lines or your cellular network.
It can transmit both voice and video.
The Internet was developed to ensure faster delivery of communications such as e-mail.
All popular social networking sites have privacy policies, but you still need to follow certain precautions when using their sites.
With a client-based e-mail account, you can view your e-mail only from the computer on which the client program is installed.
When shopping on the web, it is better to pay for your purchase with a debit card rather than a credit card.
A browser's bookmark feature makes it easy to return to a specific web page.
Using the browser feature called tab isolation, you can drag an open tab away from its current window and open it in a new window.
The semantic web uses metadata with text data to make it more easily processed by computers.
Wikipedia is a good reference for a research paper.
When evaluating the relevance of a website, an important factor is the date of publication.
A criticism of hashtag activism is that it fosters a false sense of involvement.
Geolocation is a GPS enabled feature on a smartphone that provides your location to apps like Uber.
One method of cyberbullying involves spreading rumors about another person.
